thread.title: Clinton wins Sanders's backing over email scandal
thread.title_full: Clinton wins Sanders's backing over email scandal | News24

author: news24.com
title: Clinton wins Sanders's backing over email scandal
text:
Las Vegas - Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton won unexpected support from chief rival Bernie Sanders on Tuesday for her use of a private email server as US secretary of state, helping to defuse an issue that has overshadowed her campaign.
Echoing comments she has made before, Clinton said her decision to not use a government email address was a mistake, but she emphasised that she wanted to focus her energy on policy issues that were more important to voters.
Sanders came to her aid. "Let me say something that may not be great politics, but I think the secretary is right," he said. "The American people are sick and tired of hearing about your damn emails."
The crowd roared and Clinton beamed.
